altTitles.ja: IS〈インフィニット・ストラトス〉シュガー＆ハニー

description.en:
The newest IS spinoff that stars Charlotte! This monthly webcomic is sure to show you more of her life that hasn't been shown in the light novels nor the anime. With stories that is as sweet and enticing as its title, you'll be wanting for more. Be sure to not to miss out on this serialization about the ever adorable Charlotte, Ichika and the others!  
  
Related:  
> [Infinite Stratos - Official Anthology Comic](https://mangadex.com/manga/4768)  
> [Infinite Stratos2 - Official Anthology Comic](https://mangadex.org/manga/16466)  
>[Infinite Stratos Black Bunny/White Bitter](https://mangadex.org/manga/16181/)   
> [IS!(4koma)](https://mangadex.com/manga/4779)  
> [Infinite Stratos](https://mangadex.org/manga/425)  
Relaunch:  
[Infinite Stratos (YUUKI Homura)](https://mangadex.com/manga/9064)
description.pt-br:
O mais novo spinoff de IS estrelado por Charlotte! Este webcomic mensal com certeza mostrará mais de sua vida que não foi mostrada nas light novels ou no anime. Com histórias tão doces e atraentes quanto seu título, você vai querer mais. Não deixe de perder esta serialização sobre a sempre adorável Charlotte, Ichika e os outros!

Relacionado:  
> [Infinite Stratos - Official Anthology Comic](https://mangadex.com/manga/4768)  
> [Infinite Stratos2 - Official Anthology Comic](https://mangadex.org/manga/16466)
